  • titan_pylib.graph.bellman_ford

titan_pylib.graph.bellman_ford のソースコード

 1from typing import List, Optional, Union, Tuple
 2


[ドキュメント]
 3def bellman_ford(G: List[List[Tuple[int, int]]], s: int, inf: Union[int, float]=float('inf')) -> Optional[List[Union[int, float]]]:
 4  '''Return dist from s. / O(|V||E|)'''
 5  n = len(G)
 6  dist = [inf] * n
 7  dist[s] = 0
 8  for _ in range(n):
 9    update = 0
10    for v, e in enumerate(G):
11      for x, c in e:
12        if dist[v] != inf and dist[v] + c < dist[x]:
13          dist[x] = dist[v] + c
14          update = 1
15    if not update:
16      break
17  else:
18    return None  # NEGATIVE CYCLE
19  return dist
